post_detail.description: This multi-platform campaign was designed by agency Campfire to generate neighborhood buzz from the casting and the shoot (in suburban Pittsburgh, PA).  ClickFire Media produced part of this campaign and created a 5-episode reality series. Housed at 2pointhome.com, the complex 4-month long production involved all live-action production, story production, fully animated promo videos and trailers post design and editorial.
post_detail.title: Verizon More or Less
